StepsToGettingALicense.title: Steps to getting a <primary>driver's license</primary>
StepsToGettingALicense.perex: Follow the steps and successfully obtain your driving licence with STAR Driving School.

steps.title: Fill in the application
steps.description: Fill in the application form with your personal details and we will offer you a suitable date and form of tuition.

steps.title: Theory & eTests
steps.description: Learn the rules of the road and practice them with eTests to prepare for your theory test.

steps.title: Practical driving
steps.description: Gain driving experience under the supervision of professional instructors in real traffic and complex traffic situations.

steps.title: Exams & License
steps.description: After completing theory and driving, we will register you for the test. Once you pass, you'll get your driver's license and can set off to pursue your dreams.
